name: SeCWurity WP Login
author: slmsmsk

sections.description:
Is there any doubt the security of your site? Do you think that your computer has keylogger virus? Do you think someone has stolen your password? None of this is important when you get this plugin ðŸ™‚
SeCWrity Wp Login is coded for your sites againts brute force attacks, keylogger viruses and more..
sections.installation:
1. Upload folder of plugin to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Go to Cyber-Warrior > SeCWurity Login and make the settings by yourself.
  4. Do not forget to change your password.
sections.faq:
I forgot my password. What should I do?

You can change your password by providing access to the database.

Learn more (and get detailed instructions) in our contribute guide.
